mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_reward_info(reward_id, reward_name, acquired_date, host, content, seeker_id) VALUES(user_reward_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rewardName}, TO_DATE(#{acquiredDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{host}, #{content}, #{seekerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_reward_info SET reward_name = #{rewardName}, acquired_date = TO_DATE(#{acquiredDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), host = #{host}, content = #{content}, seeker_id = #{seekerId} WHERE reward_id = #{rewardId}
mapper.select: SELECT reward_name, TO_CHAR(acquired_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS acquired_date, host, content FROM user_reward_info WHERE reward_id=#{VALUE}
SELECT reward_name, TO_CHAR(acquired_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS acquired_date, host, content FROM user_reward_info WHERE seeker_id=#{seekerId}
select count(*) FROM user_reward_info WHERE seeker_id = #{seekerId}
